resources.string:
A
Acceptable. Studies in pregnant women show no risks. 
B
May be acceptable. Either animals or humans were under test, and conducted tests show no risks. 
C
Use with caution if benefits outweigh risks. Humans were not under test. Animals may were tested. 
D
Use in extreme emergencies when alternatives are not available. There is positive evidence of risks on humans.
X
Never use in pregnancy. There is positive evidence of risks on humans. Risks outweigh benefits, and safer alternatives are available.
